content:
```
Define the module named TopModule with input port 'in' and output port 'out'.

Retrieved Related Information:
- in: input port, one bit (Type:Signal)
- out: output port, one bit (Type:Signal)
- The module should assign the output port to the same value as the input port combinationally. (Type:StateTransition)
```
source: I would like you to implement a module named TopModule with the following interface. All input and output ports are one bit unless otherwise specified. - input  in - output out

content:
```
Implement combinational logic to assign the output port 'out' to the same value as the input port 'in'.

Retrieved Related Information:
out: output port, one bit (Type:Signal)
The module should assign the output port to the same value as the input port combinationally. (Type:StateTransition)
```
source: The module should assign the output port to the same value as the input port combinationally.
